text: Elías Jácome Guerrero (November 2, 1945 – July 26, 1999) was the first Ecuadorian soccer referee to participate in a FIFA World Cup. He supervised the Spain versus South Korea match (3-1) during the 1990 FIFA World Cup held in Italy. ==References== * Profile * Article by FEF Category:1945 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Ecuadorian football referees Category:FIFA World Cup referees Category:1990 FIFA World Cup referees Category:Copa América referees Category:Place of birth missing
title: Elías Jácome
